abstract.p: Champion Products consolidates apparel account by naming Long Haymes Carr to handle its JogBra business (S)

block.p: Champion Products in Winston-Salem, N.C., part of the branded apparel group of the Sara Lee Corporation, consolidated its apparel account by naming Long Haymes Carr in Winston-Salem, to handle its JogBra business in addition to the Men's Products business it already handles. Billings for the consolidated account were estimated at $10 million.
Howard Upchurch, vice president for marketing at Champion, said there was not a review for the business, which was merged in April, but that ''we looked at the existing agencies.''

Champion Products in Winston-Salem, N.C., part of the branded apparel group of the Sara Lee Corporation, consolidated its apparel account by naming Long Haymes Carr in Winston-Salem, to handle its JogBra business in addition to the Men's Products business it already handles. Billings for the consolidated account were estimated at $10 million.
Howard Upchurch, vice president for marketing at Champion, said there was not a review for the business, which was merged in April, but that ''we looked at the existing agencies.''

The JogBra business had been handled by Earle Palmer Brown in New York, part of EPB Communications, for almost two years. Long Haymes, part of the Lowe Group unit of the Interpublic Group of Companies, has handled advertising for Sara Lee's Hanes division since 1962.
